Package thorwin.math

Provides a variety of math related classes.

Package thorwin.math Description

Provides a variety of math related classes.

The Math class provides a variety of general math functions, such as greatest-common-divisor, odd/even, mean, median, standard-deviation, variance, polynomials and polynomial-fitting. These methods can be statically imported.

The Complex class provides support for complex numbers.

The class Matrix provides real matrix arithmetic. This includes all common matrix operators, and various common decompositions (QR, LU, Cholesky, Singular Value, Eigen).

The classes Vector and ComplexVector are real and complex vector implementations. All common operators are available. Additionaly, the ComplexVector provides Fast Fourier Transformation and convolution support.
